Blue World Teams With Macromedia

15 Jun 1999

Blue World announces agreement with Macromedia to deliver integrated solution for dynamic web publishing. Custom Lasso Objects for Dreamweaver to be made available from both Blue World and Macromedia will enable the efficient creation of dynamic, database-driven Web sites. See the Blue World press release for more information.\n
